p: The identification of the essential oil constituents was based on the comparison of their Kovats retention indices (RIs), determined relative to the tR values of n-alkanes (C 10–C 35) with either those of the literature [ 37, 38, 39] and mass spectra on both columns with those of authentic compounds available in our laboratories by means NIST 02 and Wiley 275 mass spectral libraries [ 40]. The components’ relative concentrations were obtained by peak area normalization. No response factors were calculated.
